actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Land Sales Full Disclosure Act to clarify how the Act applies to condominiums.

summary.text: Amends the Interstate Land Sales Full Disclosure Act to exempt from certain registration and disclosure requirements the sale or lease of a condominium unit not already exempt from coverage under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Land Sales Full Disclosure Act to clarify how the Act applies to condominiums.
